text: dark chocolate and sea salt
are one of my favorite combinations and
a guaranteed crowd-pleaser you only need
three ingredients to get started lightly
spray an 8 or 9 inch square pan with
cooking spray this is just going to hold
down the parchment layer pour 8 ounces
of melted dark chocolate so choose a
dark chocolate that's 70% cocoa that way
you have less added sugar and more of
those really healthful antioxidants
smooth with a offset spatula to make it
nice and even so we're going to add to
this a quarter cup of shelled pistachios
just really roughly chopped
so pistachios add a really nice crunch
nice heart-healthy fats beautiful color
so sprinkle this on top of the chocolate
last handful here gorgeous now for the
finishing touch I like to add a good
sprinkle of flaky sea salt this helps
balance out the sweetness and the
chocolate brings out the flavor the
pistachios also adds a nice crunch
transfer this dish to the fridge until
it sets up in about 30 minutes or so
it's been about 30 minutes chocolate is
nice and set up now use your handy
parchment flaps here to lift it out and
then break it into chunks I like to use
the tip of a knife you could just use
your hands looks great trick or treat
this is definitely a healthy Halloween
treat all right
looks great let's try it mmm thumbs up
why buy this when you can make it
yourself super simple easy and such a
treat
Oh
you
